title: Samsung Replaces Its Aging Smart View App With A New Version And A New Listing
text:
Samsung Replaces Its Aging Smart View App With A New Version And A New Listing 
Published By: AndroidPolice.com - Today 
Remember Samsung's Smart View app? It's OK if you don't - it's basically a mix of a remote control and some Chromecast-style functionality, ...
